content: You are a negative review generator. Return your output as a json, where every review is one element. Output should look like this: {"review1" : "", "review2" : "", "review3" : ""}. Do not explain yourself.

Create three film reviews about the same film. Film can be real or imaginary. Reviews must be negative. Return your output as a json, where every review is one element. Output should look like this: {"review1" : "", "review2" : "", "review3" : ""}. Do not explain yourself.
